courseTitle: Digital Literacy Mastery: From Computer Basics to Mastering Coding
courseDescription: A comprehensive course designed to take you from basic computer literacy to advanced coding skills. Learn how to navigate digital tools, understand online safety, use productivity software, and dive into programming languages like Python and JavaScript.

courseModules.moduleDescription: Understanding the importance of digital skills and how they can help you in everyday life.

lessons.lessonDescription: Introduction to digital literacy and its importance in the modern world.
Learn about computer hardware, software, and operating systems.
Basics of the internet, browsing, and search engines.

courseModules.moduleDescription: Learn how to efficiently use a computer and its applications for everyday tasks.

lessons.lessonDescription: A guide to understanding the most popular operating systems and their basic functions.
Learn about file management, creating folders, and organizing documents.
Introduction to creating, editing, and formatting text documents.

courseModules.moduleTitle: Module 3: Introduction to the Internet and Online Safety
courseModules.moduleDescription: Learn how to use the internet safely, communicate online, and understand privacy and security.

lessons.lessonDescription: Learn how to navigate different web browsers and use their features.
How to send and manage emails, and use social media platforms responsibly.
Understanding internet safety, privacy protection, and recognizing scams.

courseModules.moduleTitle: Module 4: Productivity Tools for Everyday Life
courseModules.moduleDescription: Master productivity tools that help with work and personal organization.

lessons.lessonDescription: An introduction to creating, editing, and analyzing data using spreadsheets.
Learn how to create effective and engaging presentations.
How to use cloud storage platforms like Google Drive or OneDrive for file sharing and backup.

courseModules.moduleDescription: Learn the basics of programming and understand how code works.

lessons.lessonDescription: An introduction to the concept of programming and its importance in technology.
Learn about algorithms and how they help solve problems in programming.
Explore variables, data types, loops, and their role in basic programming.

courseModules.moduleDescription: Start learning Python, a beginner-friendly programming language.

lessons.lessonDescription: How to install and set up Python on your computer.
Writing your first Python program and understanding its structure.

lessons.lessonTitle: Conditional Statements and Loops in Python
lessons.lessonDescription: Learn how to use if-statements, loops, and conditionals to control program flow.

courseModules.moduleTitle: Module 7: Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
courseModules.moduleDescription: Learn the basics of web development and build your own website.

lessons.lessonDescription: Learn how to structure content on the web using HTML.
Learn how to make your website visually appealing with CSS.
Add interactivity to your website by learning the basics of JavaScript.

courseModules.moduleTitle: Module 8: Advanced Coding: Python and JavaScript
courseModules.moduleDescription: Master more advanced programming concepts in Python and JavaScript.

lessons.lessonDescription: Learn the fundamentals of object-oriented programming with Python.
Learn how to fetch and manipulate data using APIs in JavaScript.
Learn how to build web applications using Python and the Flask framework.

courseModules.moduleTitle: Module 9: Final Project - Build a Web Application
courseModules.moduleDescription: Combine all the skills you've learned to create a fully functional web application.

lessons.lessonDescription: Learn how to plan and design your web application before development.
Start building the front end and back end of your web application.
Learn how to test, debug, and deploy your web application online.

courseCertification.certificateDescription: Upon completing the course and the final project, you'll receive a certificate of completion recognizing your digital literacy and programming skills.
